Title:
Two new species of sequestrate Agaricus (section Minores)
from Australia
Abstract:
The novel species Agaricus lamelliperditus and A.
colpeteii are described and illustrated, and affinities to other taxa
determined by analysis of ITS sequence data. Both taxa resemble several
other recently described Australian sequestrate Agaricus species, in
particular A. pachydermus, A. wariatodes and A. chartaceus, which all
have a powdery hymenophore from very early stages of basidiome
formation. Both novel species have affinities to section Minores.
